Body:
"""Test the calculation of great circle distance"""
for ra1, dec1, ra2, dec2, dist in [(0, 0, 0, 1, 1), (0, -90, 180, 90, 180),
    (120, 89, 300, 89, 2.0), (0, 0, 179.99999, 0, 179.99999), (12.0, -90, 
    45, -90, 0)]:
    ans = at.gcd(ra1, dec1, ra2, dec2)
    assert_almost_equal(ans, dist, err_msg=
        '{0:5.2f},{1:5.2f} <-> {2:5.2f},{3:5.2f} == {4:g} != {5:g}'.format(
        ra1, dec1, ra2, dec2, dist, ans))
